column1: <table cellspacing="2" cellpadding="3" summary="Services Available" border="0" class="aligncenter">
Tameside Central Library
Send a Message to Central Library
From 23rd April to 30th July 2006 Tameside Central Library will be opening on a Sunday: 11.00am - 2.00pm
Tameside Libraries Information Service
Send a Message to the Libraries Information Service
More information about Tameside Libraries Information Service
Tameside Local Studies and Archives Unit
Send a Message to Local Studies Library
More information about Tameside Local Studies Library
We regret archive material cannot be produced between 12 noon and 2 pm on Saturdays, please ring in advance to discuss your requirements and we may be able to get material out ready for your visit.
Centre for the Visually Impaired has moved to Dukinfield Library
